content.rendered:
Maximum weight :  Between 24 kg  and 32 kg.

Weight charge       :  60 Euros/60 USD.

 

For more details visit : http://www.airnostrum.com/Baggage/Baggage-Information

Air Nostrum Hand | Cabin  Baggage

Air Nostrum Checked Baggage
